summary: This document is an email exchange from June 11, 2020, regarding the closure of the 'Epstein Threat case' by the FBI-New York C-19 Violent Crimes Task Force. It indicates that results and information regarding phone numbers and email addresses were added to the case file before closure.

events.title: Closure of Epstein Threat Case
events.description: An email exchange indicates the 'Epstein Threat case' is being closed by the FBI-New York C-19 Violent Crimes Task Force, with all results and information regarding phone numbers and email addresses added to the case file.

keyFacts: The 'Epstein Threat case' was closed on or around June 11, 2020.
The case was handled by the FBI-New York C-19 Violent Crimes Task Force.
The case file included results and information regarding phone numbers and email addresses.
The document is an internal email exchange about administrative closure of the case.
